item.title: Lifts constantly out of order- have to use stinking urine soaked stairs, 15th June
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Street, Beckenham, London

item.title: BMW been parked in the same place for at least 6 months hasn’t moved., 15th June
item.description:
BMW has been parked in the same place for at least 6 months. The mot ran out in October so it could be that far back. The problem is it’s not parked in the safest of places. You have car turning right into Lavernock and cars coming down Frances and it’s dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 9, Francis Avenue, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet
